T02D2113:154a-0: @154a ` // bla ma dam pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2113:154a-1: khrus kyi cho ga bya ste /
T02D2113:154a-3: dag par byed cing sdig sel ba /
T02D2113:154a-5: khrus kyi cho ga bshad de /
T02D2113:154a-7: phyi'i khrus dang nang gi khrus so //
T02D2113:154a-8: dang po phyi'i khrus bya ste /
T02D2113:154a-9: sa gtsang ma la mandal byas la /
T02D2113:154a-10: de'i steng du bum pa skyon spangs pa gzhag /
T02D2113:154a-11: ras kha tshar ma nyams pas bum pa'i mgul chings
T02D2113:154a-12: bya / 'bras bu can gyi shing gis bum pa'i kha rgyan bya /
T02D2113:154a-13: nang du chu gtsang mas bkang la /
T02D2113:154a-14: snying po rnam pa lnga la /
T02D2113:154a-16: rtsi thog gi snying po mar /
T02D2113:154a-17: shing thog gi snying po bu ram /
T02D2113:154a-18: me tog gi snying po sbrang rtsi /
T02D2113:154a-37: de dud 'gro'i sa bon yin par 'dod /
T02D2113:154a-38: rdzas de rnams bum pa'i nang du blugs la /
T02D2113:154a-39: mandal gyi steng du gzhag / de nas rang 'jam dpal du skad cig gis bskyed la /
T02D2113:154a-40: las thams cad pa'i sngags lan cig brjod la stong bsam mo //
T02D2113:154a-41: de'i ngang las bum pa'i nang du bhr'um 'phros 'dus
T02D2113:154a-42: pas phyi rin po che gser gyi bum pa la
T02D2113:154a-43: / nang rin po che lnga'i gzhal yas khang phyi nas bltas na nang gsal ba /
T02D2113:154a-44: nang nas bltas na phyi gsal ba cig tu bsgom /
T02D2113:154a-45: bum pa'i khar padma 'dab brgyad pa cig bsam /
T02D2113:154a-47: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas aa las byung //
T02D2113:154a-49: de la dza:h'um bam ho:sa aa las 'jam dpal bsgom /
T02D2113:154a-51: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas aa las byung //
T02D2113:154b-0: de la dza:h'um bam ho:sa @154b ye shes pa dgug gzhug bya /
T02D2113:154b-1: las thams cad pa'i bsngags bzlas pas /
T02D2113:154b-2: 'jam dpal gyi gsang ba nas bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun byung nas bum pa khengs par bsam mo //
T02D2113:154b-3: ye shes pa gshegs su gsol /
T02D2113:154b-4: dam tshig pa 'od du zhu nas khrus chu dang 'dres par bsam mo //
T02D2113:154b-5: nang zab mo sngags kyi khrus ni /
T02D2113:154b-6: 'jam dpal du skad cig gis bsgoms la /
T02D2113:154b-7: 'dud dang sngags kyi mjug la aa nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod la /
T02D2113:154b-8: de nas ye shes kyi me long gi ngang la
T02D2113:154b-9: gzhag pas sgrib pa lnga ni sems nyid la gser
T02D2113:154b-10: gyi g-ya' tsam yang ma gos te /
T02D2113:154b-11: de ni nang gi khrus zhes bya'o //
T02D2113:154b-13: nang gi rnam rtog gi dri ma rnams 'khrud pa'i brnga yin /
T02D2113:154b-14: phyi khrus nang khrus slob dpon sngom pa bzang po'i
